wattwatt.components.devices.suspendable.fridge

Class Fridge

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent
        • wattwatt.components.devices.suspendable.fridge.Fridge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.interfaces.CyPhyComponentI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.interfaces.EmbeddingComponentAccessI

    public class Fridge
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent
implements fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.interfaces.EmbeddingComponentAccessI
    The class Fridge

    Description

    This class implements the fridge component. The fridge requires the controller interface because he have to be connected to the controller to receive order from him.

    Created on : 2020-01-27

    Author:

    Bah Thierno, Zheng Pascal
